summary:
Smashing Pumpkins is an American rock band from Chicago, formed in 1988. The original members were Billy Corgan (lead singer, guitar), James Iha (guitar), D'arcy Wretzky (bass), and Jimmy Chamberlin (drums). Their music style is a mix of gothic rock, heavy metal, and grunge.

Their first album, *Gish* (1991), was a hit, and their second, *Siamese Dream* (1993), made them even more popular. After their third album, *Mellon Collie and the Infinite Sadness* (1995), they faced internal issues and broke up in the late '90s. They reunited in 2006 and have released several albums since, with Corgan as the only constant member. Their latest album, *Aghori Mhori Mei*, came out in 2024.
title: The Smashing Pumpkins
